about_the_game:
Purchase to receive the pet hero: Iger, and Iger's treasure: The Eagle collar
Iger will provide teammates with group acceleration, hit bonus, but also has a good attack. In addition, as a pet hero, Iger is not limited to the number of team members. You can still play it after the team size limit is reached!

Background:
Iger comes from a remote village with an eagle as its totem, and is regarded as the "guardian eagle". Iger's sharp claws and beak, along with his keen eyesight, allow him to swoop down from high in the air to launch surprise attacks, taking enemies by surprise.
